effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 589,032.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

Set: Modified by Warm Sunrise Bracers.

Damaging spells and abilities have the chance to cause your tailored threads to radiate with Woven Dawnweave granting 2,606 Mastery for 30 sec.

spells.description: Equip: Wearing these bracers will alter the effects of Duskthread Lining and Woven Duskweave become Dawnweave instead.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

name: Mug's Moxie Jug

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 916 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 916 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.

description: The word 'Moxie' is hastily scribbled on.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 12,570 for 15 sec.
Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 229,879 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,500 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
